Miracle {2}{R}{R} [i](You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)[/i]
Whenever Brilliant Bladebearer becomes tapped, exile the top two cards of your library, then choose a card from among them and a Soldier card from among them. You may play cards chosen this way until the end of your next turn.
